hero.title: ABOUT
hero.tagline: Multi-industry Drone Solutions - Technology Pioneer - Professional

paragraphs: is a brand specializing in multi-industry Drone solutions, developed from the technology platform, human resources, and experience of Hitek Drone - the pioneer in Drone Light Show and aerial performance technology in Vietnam.

As part of Hitek Group JSC, Hitek Flycam expands Hitek Drone's mission to technical fields, surveying, logistics and industrial services, with the goal of bringing flying technology to serve other areas such as daily life, production, and smart management.

hero.title: DELIVERY DRONE
hero.subtitle: Drone delivery solutions designed for industrial zones, agriculture, and hard-to-reach areas — optimizing costs, time, and manpower.

items.title: Internal delivery: warehouses, factories, production zones.
Transporting samples, documents, components in agriculture or industry.
Trial delivery services and drone logistics models.
Analyze needs & cargo weight.
Map flight routes, takeoff/landing points, automated journeys.
Configure equipment, safety checks & flight permit applications.
Conduct test flights, log data, and hand over operational procedures.

items.question: What are common applications of drone logistics?
items.answer: Internal transportation, sample delivery, components, or emergency supplies in hard-to-reach areas.

items.question: How much payload can delivery drones carry?
items.answer: Depending on the equipment - from approximately 5kg to 30kg or more, suitable for warehouse, industrial, and agricultural internal needs.

items.question: Is the navigation system safe?
items.answer: All drones use GPS combined with AI obstacle avoidance, ensuring high safety and accuracy.

items.question: What are operating conditions in bad weather?
items.answer: Equipment meets IP54 standards or higher – operates in wind levels 4-5 or light rain, specific checks needed for each project.

hero.title: DRONE FILMING
hero.subtitle: Hitek Flycam offers professional aerial filming and photography services using drones for advertising, media, events, and tourism.

items.title: TVC & corporate advertising filming
items.description: Resorts, industrial zones, real estate, factories.

items.title: Tourism photography/videography for local promotion
Event & festival recording
items.description: Multi-angle filming, live streaming with multiple drones.

items.title: Post-production
items.description: Cinematic color grading, video editing, voiceover, motion logo.

items.title: Receive brief and consult on shooting angles, storyboard.
Apply for flight permits & prepare suitable equipment for the location.
Conduct filming with flight team & director coordination.
Post-production, color grading, export in desired format.
Deliver videos, photos, and source files (upon request).

items.question: Is a flight permit required before filming?
items.answer: Yes - all commercial filming activities are supported by us for permit applications to ensure legality and safety.

items.question: Can drones film in strong wind or night conditions?
items.answer: We use specialized drones resistant to wind levels 5-6, and have specialized night/low-light filming equipment, complying with safety regulations.

items.question: Does it include professional post-production or perspectives?
items.answer: Yes - the service includes aerial filming, post-production editing, color grading, and file formatting according to brand requirements.

items.question: What video and image sizes are supported?
items.answer: Support formats from 4K to 8K, high-resolution images, standard encoding for advertising, television, and social media.

parts: compared to retail or agent purchases.

items.question: Which brands does Hitek Flycam import?
items.answer: We are partners with DJI, Autel, Yuneec, and other specialized industrial manufacturers.

items.question: What are the import procedures?
items.answer: Support for CO, CQ, customs documentation, equipment registration and warranty in Vietnam – all transparent and legal.

items.question: Do drones come with genuine warranty?
items.answer: All equipment comes with international warranty stamps and domestic technical warranty.

items.question: Is there support after equipment handover?
items.answer: We provide installation support, initial calibration, and equipment inspection.

hero.title: DRONE REPAIR
hero.subtitle: Professional drone repair and maintenance services, keeping your equipment stable, safe, and at peak performance.

items.title: Inspection & Component Replacement
items.description: Comprehensive inspection, fault diagnosis, component replacement

items.title: System Updates & Calibration
items.description: Software updates, IMU sensor calibration, compass, GPS system calibration

items.title: Safety Checks & Post-Repair Warranty
items.description: Pre- and post-flight safety checks, repair service warranty

items.title: Receive request and preliminary diagnosis via customer-provided images/videos or error data.
On-site inspection at workshop or field: fault analysis, repair plan establishment.
Execute component replacement, software upgrades, sensor calibration to technical standards.
Test flight verification (if needed) or system connection & image transmission testing, report recording.
Equipment handover, provide repair report and warranty, guide customers on subsequent operational procedures.

parts: of drone systems – saving major replacement costs long-term.
reduce operational risks – especially important for technical or commercial flights.

items.question: How often should drone maintenance be performed?
items.answer: Recommendation: at least every 3 months or after approximately 30-50 flight hours, depending on usage intensity.

items.question: Can drones with directional drift or poor GPS be repaired?
items.answer: Yes, we calibrate IMU sensors, compass, and GPS systems to fix positioning errors and incorrect flight paths.

items.question: Do you offer online inspection or remote device sending?
items.answer: Yes, customers can send their devices or visit our headquarters for inspection, diagnosis, and repair.

items.question: Is there warranty after repair?
items.answer: Yes, all repair services come with an acceptance report and technical warranty from 30-90 days.

hero.title: FLIGHT PERMIT SERVICE
hero.subtitle: Solutions for obtaining legal drone/flycam flight permits in Vietnam, ensuring compliance with Ministry of Defense and Ministry of Public Security regulations.

items.title: Flight permits for filming, surveying, technical inspection, performances, and testing.
Legal consulting: no-fly zone regulations, altitude limits, equipment requirements.
Equipment registration & commercial flight insurance according to Vietnamese standards.
Collect area information, flight purpose, and schedule.
Check legal conditions & prepare permit application documents.
Submit and track applications with management authorities.
Receive valid permits & guidance for compliant operations.

parts: On-site support from team well-versed in

items.question: When is a drone flight permit required?
items.answer: All commercial flights, flights in special areas, or beyond visual line of sight in Vietnam require permits before operation.

items.question: Which areas does Hitek Flycam support for permit applications?
items.answer: Hitek Flycam supports flight permit applications nationwide.

items.question: How long does permit application processing take?
items.answer: Depending on the area and flight purpose - typically 3-7 working days.

items.question: Can I apply for flight permits myself?
items.answer: Yes, but it's very complex and easily rejected. Hitek Flycam provides complete packages including documentation, maps, and legal support, achieving nearly 100% approval rate.

hero.title: SURVEYING DRONE
hero.subtitle: Surveying and technical mapping solutions using drones, employing Lidar, RTK-GPS, and multispectral imaging to collect spatial data with high accuracy.

items.title: Terrain surveying for construction, urban planning, mining.
2D/3D mapping, ground models (DEM/DTM), orthophotos, and 3D mesh.
Area measurement, material volume calculation, construction progress monitoring.
Site survey and measurement objectives determination.
Flight planning, coordinate zoning, and safety limits.
Data collection flights using Lidar or RTK-GPS drones.
Image processing, mapping, volume measurement, and 3D model creation.
Data delivery with detailed technical reports.

parts.text: Low error, stable data, fast processing

parts: of Hitek Flycam's legal and technical requirements.

items.question: What are the advantages of Surveying Drones compared to traditional methods?
items.answer: Surveying drones can replace or complement manual surveying in many projects, especially in hard-to-reach areas. The data collected has high accuracy, saving time and labor.

items.question: How long does the surveying process take?
items.answer: Depending on the area and complexity, typically only 1-3 days for data collection flights and 1-2 days for processing.

items.question: What accuracy level do Hitek Flycam surveying drones achieve?
items.answer: We use RTK-GPS equipment, LiDAR, and multispectral imagery to collect data, with errors typically achieving only ±1–3 cm depending on field conditions.

items.question: What types of output data are provided?
items.answer: 2D/3D maps, DSM/DTM models, orthophotos, point-cloud, 3D mesh - data can be integrated into CAD/GIS software.

items.question: Can output data be integrated into design software?
items.answer: Yes. We deliver data compatible with AutoCAD, Revit, Pix4D, Agisoft, or other GIS systems.
